title: Slate Plus Bonus: The "Live from Chelsea New York's Slate Day" Edition
description:
In this Slate Plus special Emily Bazelon, David Plotz and guest Nikole Hannah-Jones discuss the Democratic Primary and the crucial African American vote, potential antitrust investigations of Big Tech and how the resegregation of America's public schools is ruining our future.
Join Slate Plus to hear this episode in full! 
www.Slate.com/gabfestplus
Recorded by Merritt Jacobs
Research by Bridgette Dunlap
Edit by Jocelyn Frank
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
